name: Sarah Resort
description: Sarah Resort is a unique resort with modern facilities which is situated at Rajabari in Gazipur.It includes Water sports, cycling, boating.

name: Bhawal Resort
description: Bhawal Resort is an elegant resort surrounded by rain forest which is located at Gazipur, Dhaka. It is an exotic resort with 61 cottages.

name: Rajendra Eco Resort
description: Rajendra Eco Resort & Village is one of the largest resorts in Bangladesh with 57 cottages and 100 room which is situated at Bhabanipur Bazar, Gazipur, Dhaka.

name: Neel Komol Resort
description: Neel Komol Resort is a resort of noiseless calm beauty where you can hear the racket of the firefly in the evening and it is not very far from Dhaka too.

name: Lakeshore Resort
description: Lakeshore Resort is situated on the bank of Kaptai lake, one of most spectacular lakes in Bangladesh which is encompassed by the dignified hill tracks.

name: Dhaka Resort
description: Dhaka Resort is one of the best resorts in Bangladesh that is famous for beautiful Bhawal Ghor and rain forest which is established at Gazipur, Dhaka.

name: Jamuna Resort
description: Jamuna Resort is a resort where you can feel the exotic environment with gorgeous decorations. Itâ€™s a model resort with a combination of a romantic and familial atmosphere.

name: The Third Terrace
description: The Third Terrace is a beautiful resort, situated at Gazipur on 3 acres of land where you can make a family trip as well as business travel.

name: Mawa Resort
description: If you want to expand your holiday in a beyond reproach beautiful place the Mawa Resort will be the perfect one for you and will suit your pocket also.
